properties.name: Elva Autumnborn
properties.summary: Elva Autumnborn is a Legendary Support champion from the Sylvan Watchers faction. She is a powerful utility champion, excelling in providing speed, cleansing, and healing to her team. Her unique ability to place Block Debuffs and remove debuffs simultaneously makes her a top-tier choice for Arena and various dungeon content.

skills.name: Wyrdwood Staff
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Autumnal Ritual
skills.description: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then places a [Block Debuffs] buff and a [Continuous Heal] buff on them for 2 turns.

skills.name: Verdant Blessing
skills.description: Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 25%, then places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on them for 2 turns.

skills.name: Life Bloom (Passive)
skills.description: Heals each ally by 10% of their MAX HP at the start of their turn.

mastery_builds.build_name: Arena, Faction Wars, Dungeons, Doom Tower

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is crucial to reduce cooldowns, making her significantly more effective. A 6-star rank is necessary for her to survive in high-level content.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Excellent carry for all content.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Remains a top-tier support in all areas.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Core member of many end-game teams, especially in Arena and Hydra.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: He-Man
properties.summary: He-Man is a Legendary Attack champion from the Banner Lords faction. He is a powerful nuker with the unique ability to ignore a portion of enemy defense and apply various buffs to himself. His kit is designed for high-damage output, making him a strong contender in Arena and against dungeon waves.

skills.name: Power Sword
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 25% of the target’s DEF. This attack cannot be critical.

skills.name: I Have the Power!
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on this Champion for 3 turns, then grants an Extra Turn.

skills.name: Blade of Grayskull
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Will ignore 25% of the target’s DEF. This attack cannot be critical.

skills.name: The Most Powerful Man in the Universe (Passive)
skills.description: Increases this Champion’s ATK by 25% and C. DMG by 25%. Decreases the damage this Champion receives by 25%.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is important for reducing cooldowns and increasing damage output. A 6-star rank is essential for him to function as a primary damage dealer.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Game-changing damage dealer.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Top-tier Arena nuker and wave clearer.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a strong choice for Arena offense and specific dungeon speed runs.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Leminisi the Gold-wing
properties.summary: Leminisi the Gold-wing is a Legendary Attack champion from the Sylvan Watchers faction. She specializes in placing bombs and providing crowd control through stuns. Her kit allows for a unique playstyle centered around delayed, high-impact damage, making her particularly effective in Arena and against tanky opponents.

skills.name: Gilded Talons
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.

skills.name: Golden Curse
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Places two [Bomb] debuffs on all enemies that detonate after 2 turns.

skills.name: Sunburst
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Instantly detonates all [Bomb] debuffs on all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn on enemies who have [Bomb] debuffs detonated by this skill.

skills.name: Gleaming Plumage (Passive)
skills.description: Has a 25% chance to decrease the cooldown of one of this Champion’s skills by 1 turn whenever they are hit.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is mandatory to reduce cooldowns and increase the effectiveness of her bombs and stuns. A 6-star rank is necessary for her to have enough stats to land her debuffs and survive.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Strong but requires specific team compositions to shine.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Excellent Arena specialist and wave clearer.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: A key component of bomb-focused teams for high-level Arena and Doom Tower content.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Loki the Deceiver
properties.summary: Loki the Deceiver is a Legendary Support champion from the Barbarians faction. He is a master manipulator, specializing in stealing buffs and disrupting enemy teams. His unique ability to steal all buffs from a target and place them on his own team makes him a powerful counter to buff-heavy compositions in the Arena.

skills.name: Mischief
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target.

skills.name: Master of Illusions
skills.description: Steals all buffs from a single target enemy, then places them on all allies.

skills.name: Trickster's Gambit
skills.description: Places a [Veil] buff on all allies for 2 turns and a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: God of Mischief (Passive)
skills.description: Has a 20% chance to redirect any debuff that is placed on an ally to a random enemy instead.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is crucial to reduce the cooldown of his buff steal, which is his primary function. A 6-star rank is necessary for him to have enough accuracy and survivability in high-level Arena.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Niche but can be useful in specific situations.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A strong counter-pick in Arena.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: A top-tier Arena specialist for dealing with buff-heavy teams.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Ninja
properties.summary: Ninja is a Legendary Attack champion from the Shadowkin faction. He is a versatile damage dealer, known for his ability to inflict massive damage over time through HP Burn and his escalating damage potential. He excels against bosses with high HP, making him a premier choice for Clan Boss, Dragon, and Ice Golem.

skills.name: Shatterbolt
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. The first hit has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. The second hit has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. The third hit has a 50% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Hailburn
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 3 turns. Also places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

skills.name: Cyan Tsunami
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 50%. Decreases the cooldown of this Champion’s Hailburn skill by 2 turns.

skills.name: Escalation (Passive)
skills.description: Each time this Champion uses their default skill, their C. DMG is increased by 10% (stacks up to 100%). This buff cannot be removed. Each time this Champion uses their other active skills, their ATK is increased by 10% (stacks up to 100%). This buff cannot be removed.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking Ninja is crucial to reduce cooldowns and increase the chance of placing his powerful debuffs. A 6-star rank is mandatory for him to reach his full damage potential and survive in end-game content.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A game-changing champion for any new player.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier damage dealer for almost all content.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a core member of many end-game teams, especially for Clan Boss and boss-killing.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Queen Eva
properties.summary: Queen Eva is a Legendary Attack champion from the Dark Elves faction. She is one of the fastest campaign farmers in the game, capable of clearing waves in seconds. Her kit is built around dealing massive area-of-effect damage and gaining extra turns on kills, making her a specialist for speed farming and Arena.

skills.name: Storm of Blades
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage increases by 5% for each dead ally.

skills.name: Energy Drain
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 50% of the damage inflicted. Grants an Extra Turn if the target is killed.

skills.name: Dance of Death
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. The second hit is always a critical hit.

investment_analysis.notes: Books are not essential for her primary role as a campaign farmer but can improve her performance in Arena. A 6-star rank is necessary to achieve the damage needed for one-shotting waves.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: One of the best campaign farmers, significantly speeding up progression.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Remains an excellent campaign farmer and a viable Arena nuker.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Her use narrows to campaign farming and specific speed-run strategies for dungeons and Faction Wars.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Ronda
properties.summary: Ronda is a Legendary Attack champion from the Banner Lords faction. She is a powerful single-target and area-of-effect damage dealer with a unique passive that allows her to join in on ally attacks. This makes her incredibly versatile and capable of outputting a surprising amount of damage, especially in prolonged fights.

skills.name: Pummel
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: On the Ropes
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Pain Threshold
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. The first hit places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. The second hit places a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns. The third hit places a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.

skills.name: In It to Win It (Passive)
skills.description: Has a 20% chance to join an ally’s attack on a single enemy. This Champion will use their default skill in the attack.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is important for reducing cooldowns and increasing the chance of landing her debuffs. A 6-star rank is mandatory for her to be an effective damage dealer.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: An excellent starting Legendary, providing strong damage and utility.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier damage dealer for nearly all content.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a highly effective and versatile damage dealer in end-game content.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Scyl of the Drakes
properties.summary: Scyl of the Drakes is a Legendary Defense champion from the Barbarians faction. She is one of the most versatile and impactful champions in the game, offering crowd control, healing, revival, and turn meter reduction. Her passive healing and speed reduction make her an invaluable asset in almost every area of the game, especially for progression.

skills.name: Drake's Swiftness
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Wingbeat Flurry
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Also decreases the Turn Meter of each enemy by 15%.

skills.name: Phoenix Chord
skills.description: Revives a single ally with 50% HP and a 50% Turn Meter, then places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on them for 2 turns.

skills.name: Drake's Scales (Passive)
skills.description: Heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP at the start of each turn. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on a random ally for 2 turns at the start of each turn.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is important to reduce the cooldowns on her stun and revive. A 6-star rank is mandatory for her to have the necessary stats to carry teams through difficult content.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Not available early, but a game-changer once acquired.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Transforms accounts, enabling progression in dungeons, Doom Tower, and Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a top-tier support champion, used in many end-game teams for her reliability and versatility.

properties.name: Skeletor
properties.summary: Skeletor is a Legendary Attack champion from the Undead Hordes faction. He is a specialist in placing and detonating poisons, making him an exceptional damage dealer against high-HP bosses like the Clan Boss and Dragon. His kit also includes turn meter manipulation and buff stripping, adding a layer of control to his potent damage.

skills.name: Havoc Staff
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: The Ultimate Insult
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of stripping all buffs from all enemies. Also has a 75% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns for each buff stripped.

skills.name: Kneel Before Me!
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Instantly activates all [Poison] debuffs on the target. Decreases the target’s Turn Meter by 50%.

skills.name: Lord of Destruction (Passive)
skills.description: Increases this Champion’s ACC by 10 for each enemy under a [Poison] debuff.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is mandatory to reduce cooldowns and increase the effectiveness of his poison and buff stripping abilities. A 6-star rank is necessary for him to have the accuracy and survivability needed for end-game content.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A powerful addition to any account, excelling in early boss fights.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier poisoner for Clan Boss and Dragon.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a premier choice for poison-based strategies in Clan Boss, Dragon, and Ice Golem.

properties.name: Ultimate Deathknight
properties.summary: Ultimate Deathknight is a Legendary HP champion from the Undead Hordes faction. He is a master of survivability and team protection, known for his ability to taunt enemies, heal his team, and mitigate incoming damage. His passive skill, which reduces incoming area-of-effect damage, makes him a cornerstone of defensive and go-second Arena teams.

skills.name: Soul Reaper
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Dark Shield
skills.description: Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 30% of this Champion’s MAX HP. Also places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Death Grip
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Also places a [Taunt] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.

skills.name: Immortal Aegis (Passive)
skills.description: Decreases the damage all allies receive from enemy AoE attacks by 30%. This Champion will receive that damage instead.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is important to reduce cooldowns, making his shields and taunts more frequent. A 6-star rank is mandatory for him to have enough HP to protect his team effectively.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A game-changing champion for new players, providing immense survivability.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier defensive champion for Arena, dungeons, and Hydra.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a core component of many end-game defensive and control teams.

properties.name: Aina
properties.summary: Aina is an Epic Attack champion from the Barbarians faction. She is known for her ability to place a powerful version of the Decrease Defense debuff, making her a valuable asset for increasing the damage output of her entire team. She is particularly effective in Arena and against dungeon bosses.

skills.name: Puncture
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Tear Down
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Execute
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases by 50% if the target is under a [Decrease DEF] debuff.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her 'Tear Down' skill is crucial to reduce its cooldown, allowing for more frequent application of the Decrease Defense debuff. A 6-star rank is recommended to ensure she has enough accuracy and survivability.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A strong debuffer for early dungeon and Arena teams.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Remains a viable option for Decrease Defense, especially in Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Often replaced by champions who can apply Decrease Defense to all enemies, but can still be used in specific single-target situations.

properties.name: Balthus Drauglord
properties.summary: Balthus Drauglord is an Epic Defense champion from the Undead Hordes faction. He is a durable champion focused on provoking enemies and protecting his team. His kit makes him a solid choice for crowd control in Faction Wars and specific Doom Tower floors.

skills.name: Ancient Blade
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.

skills.name: Drauglord's Wrath
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. This chance increases to 100% if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.

skills.name: Crypt Lord's Protection
skills.description: Places a [Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Also places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns and a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. The value of the Shield is proportional to this Champion's DEF.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is beneficial for reducing cooldowns and increasing the chance of landing his provoke. A 6-star rank is recommended if you plan to use him in later stages of Faction Wars or Doom Tower.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A decent defensive champion for early Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A solid specialist for Faction Wars and specific Doom Tower waves.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: His use is generally limited to Faction Wars completion for most accounts.

properties.name: Basher
properties.summary: Basher is an Epic Attack champion from the Skinwalkers faction. He is a powerful Arena controller, renowned for his ability to increase the cooldown of enemy skills. This unique form of crowd control can completely shut down enemy teams, making him a top-tier choice for Arena offense.

skills.name: Pummel
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.

skills.name: Rampage
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 2 turns before attacking.

skills.name: Ruin
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Increases the cooldown of all enemy skills by 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his 'Ruin' skill is mandatory to reduce its cooldown, which is the core of his kit. A 6-star rank is necessary for him to have the speed and accuracy required for high-level Arena.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A strong Arena champion for early-to-mid game.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier Arena controller, defining many go-first team compositions.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a premier choice for Arena offense and a key champion for Skinwalkers Faction Wars.

properties.name: Battlesage
properties.summary: Battlesage is an Epic Support champion from the High Elves faction. She provides a mix of team buffs and enemy debuffs, including Increase Attack and Decrease Attack. While she has a versatile kit, she is often outshined by more specialized champions in both roles.

skills.name: Battle-Slash
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of granting an Extra Turn.

skills.name: Blade-Ward
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Oppression
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Books are not a high priority unless she is a key member of your Faction Wars team. A 6-star rank is generally not necessary unless you lack better options for support.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A decent support champion for new players.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Her use typically falls off as more specialized champions are acquired.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Primarily used to fill a spot in the High Elves Faction Wars team.

properties.name: Dark Athel
properties.summary: Dark Athel is an Epic Attack champion from the Undead Hordes faction. She is a login reward champion with a kit designed for area-of-effect damage and some self-sustain. While she can be useful for early game progression, she is generally considered one of the weaker login reward champions.

skills.name: Dark Blade
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Blight
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. Heals this Champion by 25% of the damage inflicted.

skills.name: Profane Power
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks all enemies.

investment_analysis.notes: Books and a 6-star rank are not recommended unless you have no better options for an AoE damage dealer or for the Undead Hordes Faction Wars team.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Can serve as a campaign farmer and early dungeon wave clearer.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Her effectiveness drops off significantly as better champions are acquired.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Primarily used as a Faction Wars champion if other options are not available.

properties.name: Dark Elhain
properties.summary: Dark Elhain is an Epic Attack champion from the Undead Hordes faction. She is a powerful anti-freeze champion, designed as a direct counter to Tormin the Cold and other freeze-based teams in the Arena. Her passive ability allows her to instantly activate her nuke skill when frozen, making her a potent threat in the right matchups.

skills.name: Heart-Piercer
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. The second hit has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Culling
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage increases by 15% for each debuff on each target.

skills.name: Death's Chill (Passive)
skills.description: Whenever this Champion is frozen, instantly removes the [Freeze] debuff and fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 100%. Also has a 50% chance to instantly activate the Culling skill.

investment_analysis.notes: Books are beneficial for increasing the damage of her nuke, but not essential for her core anti-freeze function. A 6-star rank is necessary for her to have the damage stats to be an effective Arena nuker.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A solid AoE damage dealer for early game.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A powerful niche pick for Arena, especially against freeze teams.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Her value is tied to the Arena meta. If freeze teams are prevalent, she is a top-tier counter. She is also useful against the Frost Spider in Doom Tower.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Delaaja
properties.summary: Delaaja is an Epic Support champion from the Lizardmen faction. She is a fusion champion with a kit focused on healing and providing continuous heal buffs. While her healing can be substantial, she offers little else in terms of utility, which limits her use in most areas of the game.

skills.name: Soothing Touch
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on the ally with the lowest HP for 1 turn.

skills.name: Mending Ways
skills.description: Heals a target ally by 30% of their MAX HP. Places two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on the target for 2 turns.

skills.name: Lizard-Blood
skills.description: Heals all allies by 20% of their MAX HP. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Investment in this champion is generally not recommended unless you are struggling with the Lizardmen Faction Wars and have no better healing options.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Can provide some healing for early progression.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Her lack of utility makes her a poor choice for most content.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Almost exclusively used as a Faction Wars specialist if needed.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Delver
properties.summary: Delver is an Epic Attack champion from the Dark Elves faction. He is a poison-focused champion with the ability to place multiple poisons and extend their duration. This makes him a viable option for Clan Boss and Dragon's Lair, especially for players who lack top-tier poisoners.

skills.name: Venom-Tipped Steel
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Creeping Death
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Pestilence
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Extends the duration of all debuffs on the target by 1 turn. Grants an Extra Turn if the target is killed.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is important to increase the chance of placing poisons and to reduce the cooldown of his debuff extension. A 6-star rank is recommended if he is your primary poisoner for Clan Boss or Dragon.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A good source of poisons for early Clan Boss and Dragon teams.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A solid poisoner who can contribute significant damage in the right teams.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Often replaced by top-tier poisoners like Frozen Banshee or Legendary champions, but can still be a valuable member of a Dark Elves Faction Wars team.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Drake
properties.summary: Drake is an Epic Attack champion from the Lizardmen faction. He is a poison-focused champion with an area-of-effect attack that can place multiple poisons. This makes him useful for wave-based content like Dragon's Lair and for the Lizardmen Faction Wars.

skills.name: Serpent's Kiss
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Noxious Breath
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 40% chance of placing two 5% [Poison] debuffs for 2 turns.

skills.name: Poison Cloud
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Books can increase his reliability as a poisoner, but he is often outclassed by other Epic and Rare champions in this role. A 6-star rank is only recommended if he is a key part of your Lizardmen Faction Wars team.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A decent AoE poisoner for early dungeon content.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Can be a useful champion for clearing waves in Dragon's Lair and for Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: His use is generally limited to Faction Wars as better poisoners become available.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Enda Moonbeam
properties.summary: Enda Moonbeam is an Epic Support champion from the Dark Elves faction. She is a fusion champion with a kit that provides turn meter fill and speed buffs. While these are powerful effects, her long cooldowns and lack of other utility make her a less popular choice compared to other speed boosters.

skills.name: Moon Staff
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Lunar Pact
skills.description: Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 20%. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Moonbeam
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her 'Lunar Pact' skill is essential to reduce its cooldown. However, given the availability of better speed boosters like High Khatun (a free login reward), investing heavily in Enda is generally not recommended.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Can be a decent speed booster if you don't have other options.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Her long cooldowns make her difficult to use effectively in most teams.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Primarily used as a Faction Wars champion for the Dark Elves.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Ethlen the Golden
properties.summary: Ethlen the Golden is an Epic Attack champion from the High Elves faction. She is an area-of-effect damage dealer who specializes in placing the Weaken debuff. Her kit makes her a solid choice for Arena teams that need to soften up opponents before a primary nuker attacks, as well as for clearing waves in dungeons.

skills.name: Golden Bow
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 15% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Arrow Storm
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Rain of Gold
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is beneficial to increase the chance of landing Weaken and to reduce cooldowns. A 6-star rank is recommended if you plan to use her as a primary damage dealer or debuffer in Arena.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A good source of Weaken for early game teams.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A viable Arena debuffer and wave clearer for dungeons.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Often replaced by champions who offer more utility or stronger debuffs, but remains useful for High Elves Faction Wars.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Frostbringer
properties.summary: Frostbringer is an Epic Support champion from the Sacred Order faction. She is a speed-boosting champion who also provides an Increase Attack buff. Her kit is well-suited for Arena teams and for increasing the speed and damage of dungeon teams.

skills.name: Winter's Touch
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Chill of the Grave
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Boreal Blade
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her 'Boreal Blade' skill is essential to reduce its cooldown, making her a much more effective buffer. A 6-star rank is beneficial for survivability but not strictly necessary for her role.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A very strong support for early Arena and dungeon teams.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Remains a viable speed and attack buffer, though she may be replaced by champions who also provide turn meter fill.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Her use is often limited to Faction Wars, but she can still be a part of specific Arena or dungeon speed teams.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Fyr-gun Isbeil
properties.summary: Fyr-gun Isbeil is an Epic HP champion from the Dwarves faction. She specializes in placing and activating HP Burn debuffs, making her a potent damage dealer against high-HP bosses. Her kit also includes self-healing and a chance to reduce skill cooldowns, adding to her sustainability.

skills.name: Fiery Tresses
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Dance of Embers
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns. Heals this Champion by 25% of the damage inflicted.

skills.name: Incinerate
skills.description: Instantly activates any [HP Burn] debuffs on all enemies. Has a 50% chance of decreasing the cooldown of this skill by 1 turn for each enemy killed by this skill.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is important to reduce cooldowns and increase the chance of placing HP Burn. A 6-star rank is highly recommended to boost her HP and accuracy, making her much more effective in her role.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A strong champion for early dungeons, especially Spider.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier Epic for Spider's Den and a key champion for Dwarves Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a valuable champion for Hydra and specific Doom Tower bosses due to her reliable HP Burn activation.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Galkut
properties.summary: Galkut is an Epic Attack champion from the Ogryn-Tribes faction. He is an area-of-effect damage dealer who can place Increase Attack and Increase Critical Rate buffs on himself before attacking. This self-sufficiency makes him a decent campaign farmer and wave clearer for early-to-mid game players.

skills.name: Crushing Blow
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ogre Rampage
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks all enemies.

skills.name: War Cry
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn.

investment_analysis.notes: Investment in Galkut is generally not recommended as many other champions, including starter champions, can perform his role more effectively. He can be a temporary solution for campaign farming or Faction Wars if you lack better options.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A decent campaign farmer for players without a fully built starter champion.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: His effectiveness falls off as team synergy becomes more important.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Primarily used to fill a spot in the Ogryn-Tribes Faction Wars team.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Gerhard the Stone
properties.summary: Gerhard the Stone is an Epic Defense champion from the Banner Lords faction. He is a durable champion who excels at protecting a single ally with his 'Stoneguard' ability, which redirects damage. This unique mechanic, combined with his provoke, makes him a specialist for certain boss fights and for protecting fragile damage dealers.

skills.name: Stony Smite
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.

skills.name: Stoneguard
skills.description: Places a [Stoneguard] buff on a target ally for 2 turns. This buff redirects 50% of the damage the ally receives to this Champion. Also places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

skills.name: Rampart
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is important to reduce their cooldowns, significantly increasing his ability to protect allies and provide shields. A 6-star rank is necessary for him to have enough HP and Defense to be an effective tank.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A durable champion who can help with survivability in early content.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A strong specialist for Banner Lords Faction Wars and certain Doom Tower bosses.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Finds a solid role in Hydra teams and as a protector for specific strategies in Iron Twins and Sand Devil.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Ghrush the Mangler
properties.summary: Ghrush the Mangler is an Epic Defense champion from the Ogryn-Tribes faction. He is a highly versatile support champion who brings Leech, Decrease Attack, and team-wide Continuous Heal buffs. This powerful combination of debuffs and healing makes him an excellent choice for Clan Boss, dungeons, and Faction Wars.

skills.name: Mangler
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Battering Ram
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: War Cry
skills.description: Places two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on all allies for 2 turns. Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is highly recommended to reduce their cooldowns, which greatly increases his supportive capabilities. A 6-star rank is essential for him to have the necessary stats to survive and be effective in end-game content like Clan Boss.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A fantastic support champion who can help with survivability across all content.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier Epic for Clan Boss and a staple in Ogryn-Tribes Faction Wars teams.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a viable and often-used champion in Clan Boss, Hydra, and Doom Tower due to his excellent and compact kit.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Gory
properties.summary: Gory is an Epic Attack champion from the Skinwalkers faction. He is a single-target nuker who can gain an extra turn upon killing an enemy. This makes him effective at picking off targets one by one, but his reliance on kills and lack of area-of-effect damage limit his overall usability.

skills.name: Gore
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Impale
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Grants an Extra Turn if the target is killed.

skills.name: Enrage (Passive)
skills.description: Increases this Champion's ATK by 10% and C. DMG by 5% each time an ally is killed. Stacks up to 3 times.

investment_analysis.notes: Gory is a very niche champion, and investment is generally not recommended. His kit is outclassed by many other single-target damage dealers who offer more utility or raw damage.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Can be a fun champion to use in early Arena but is not a priority.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: His value diminishes quickly as opponents become tankier and AoE damage becomes more important.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Almost exclusively used to fill a slot in the Skinwalkers Faction Wars team.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Hexia
properties.summary: Hexia is an Epic Attack champion from the Undead Hordes faction. She possesses a unique passive that allows her to ignore a significant amount of enemy defense based on the number of dead allies. This makes her a high-risk, high-reward 'glass cannon' nuker, particularly effective in specific Arena compositions.

skills.name: Soulreap
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Spiritgale
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage increases by 10% for each dead ally.

skills.name: Revenant (Passive)
skills.description: Ignores 25% of enemy DEF for each dead ally. Stacks up to 100%.

investment_analysis.notes: To get the most out of Hexia, she needs to be ranked up to 6-star for maximum damage. Books are beneficial for her AoE skill but not essential, as her main strength comes from her passive. She is a niche champion, so investment should be considered carefully.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Can be a decent damage dealer, but her passive is hard to utilize effectively early on.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A niche Arena nuker for specific team compositions designed around her passive.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Her use is very limited in late-game content, but she can be a key damage dealer for the Undead Hordes Faction Wars.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: High Khatun
properties.summary: High Khatun is an Epic Support champion from the Barbarians faction, obtained as a login reward. She is one of the most impactful free champions in the game, providing a valuable speed aura, turn meter fill, and speed buffs/debuffs. She is the cornerstone of many early and mid-game Arena and dungeon teams.

skills.name: Battle Standard
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Rally the Horde
skills.description: Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15% and places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Sapping Presence
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter of each target by 15%.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is very important to reduce their cooldowns, making her one of the most effective speed leads available early on. A 6-star rank is recommended to increase her survivability and speed from banners.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A game-changing champion. She immediately becomes the best speed lead for most new accounts.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: The core of most mid-game Arena teams and a staple in dungeon speed-running teams.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: While she may be replaced by Legendary speed leads like Arbiter, she remains a top-tier Epic and is essential for Barbarians Faction Wars.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Jareg
properties.summary: Jareg is an Epic HP champion from the Lizardmen faction. He is one of the best Epic protectors in the game, providing both Ally Protection and Decrease Attack on his primary skill. This combination makes him an S-tier champion for Clan Boss and a fantastic survivability-booster for almost any other content.

skills.name: Reptilian Combo
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ironhide
skills.description: Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on this Champion for 2 turns.

skills.name: Juggernaut (Passive)
skills.description: When this Champion is attacked, has a 25% chance of placing a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his 'Ironhide' skill is mandatory to reduce its cooldown to 3 turns, allowing for 100% uptime on Ally Protection with a buff extender. A 6-star rank is essential for him to have the HP and Defense needed to survive the redirected damage in Clan Boss and other high-level content.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A game-changing pull for any account, providing top-tier survivability.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A core member of most mid-game Clan Boss teams and a key to progressing in dungeons and Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains one of the best Epic champions in the game. He is a staple in many end-game Clan Boss and Hydra teams and is invaluable for clearing difficult Doom Tower content.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Jizoh
properties.summary: Jizoh is an Epic Defense champion from the Lizardmen faction, obtained as a login reward. He is a defensive champion with a kit focused on placing a Counterattack buff on himself and protecting a single ally. While these abilities can be useful in the very early game, his overall impact is low, and he is quickly outclassed by other champions.

skills.name: Hammerfist
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.

skills.name: Bale Out
skills.description: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a 30% [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 3 turns.

skills.name: Bodyguard
skills.description: Places a [Shield] buff on an ally equal to 25% of their MAX HP for 3 turns. The ally will also receive 15% less damage from incoming attacks.

investment_analysis.notes: Jizoh is widely considered one of the weakest login reward champions. Investing books or ranking him to 6-star is not recommended, as resources are better spent on almost any other champion.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Can help a new player clear some early campaign stages but is quickly replaced.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Falls off very hard and has little to no use in mid-game content.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Serves only as a Faction Guardian or a placeholder for the Lizardmen Faction Wars team if absolutely no other options are available.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Juliana
properties.summary: Juliana is an Epic Attack champion from the Sacred Order faction. She is a powerful single-target damage dealer who excels against bosses due to her HP Burn and Poison debuffs. Her ability to fill her own turn meter also allows her to take more turns, increasing her overall damage output significantly.

skills.name: Holy Blade
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Fiery Zeal
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [HP Burn] debuff for 3 turns. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 30%.

skills.name: Partner Skill (with Romero)
skills.description: If Romero is on the same team, places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on this Champion for 2 turns at the start of each turn.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her 'Fiery Zeal' skill is important to reduce its cooldown, increasing the uptime of her HP Burn. A 6-star rank is highly recommended for her to have the stats needed to be a primary damage dealer against Clan Boss and in dungeons.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: An excellent boss killer for any new account, greatly accelerating progress in Clan Boss and Dragon.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: Remains a top-tier Epic for Clan Boss and a strong option for various dungeon bosses.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: While she can be replaced by Legendary champions, she remains a very strong option for her role and is a great asset for the Sacred Order Faction Wars.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Kunoichi
properties.summary: Kunoichi is an Epic Defense champion from the Shadowkin faction. She is a powerful support champion who brings Ally Protection, Leech, and a team-wide Weaken debuff. Her kit is exceptionally well-suited for Clan Boss and Hydra, providing both survivability and damage amplification for her team.

skills.name: Kunai Strike
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Mist Walker
skills.description: Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

skills.name: Leeching Art
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Places a [Leech] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is mandatory to reduce their cooldowns to 3 turns, allowing for 100% uptime on Ally Protection and Leech with a buff extender. A 6-star rank is essential for her to have the defense and HP needed to be an effective protector.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A fantastic support champion who provides immense survivability and healing.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier Epic for Clan Boss and a cornerstone of the Shadowkin Faction Wars team.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains one of the best Ally Protection champions in the game, frequently used in end-game Clan Boss and Hydra teams.

properties.name: Lady Quilen
properties.summary: Lady Quilen is an Epic Attack champion from the Banner Lords faction. She is a single-target damage dealer with a unique mechanic that allows her to ignore defense if the target has a higher MAX HP. This makes her a specialist for attacking high-HP champions in the Arena and certain dungeon bosses.

skills.name: Quill Barrage
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Heartseeker
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 50% of the target's DEF if they have a higher MAX HP than this Champion. Will ignore 100% of the target's DEF if they have double this Champion's MAX HP or more.

skills.name: On the Hunt
skills.description: Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: To utilize her unique passive, she needs to be built with relatively low HP, making her a glass cannon. Booking her skills is beneficial for cooldown reduction. A 6-star rank is necessary for her to deal significant damage.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Her mechanics can be difficult to utilize effectively for new players.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A niche but powerful Arena champion for dealing with tanky opponents.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Her use is generally limited to specific Arena matchups and as a damage dealer for the Banner Lords Faction Wars.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Lightsworn
properties.summary: Lightsworn is an Epic Defense champion from the Sacred Order faction. He is a powerful defensive support champion who brings Decrease Attack, Revive on Death, and team-wide Increase Defense and Continuous Heal buffs. His kit provides excellent survivability, making him a strong choice for Clan Boss, dungeons, and Faction Wars.

skills.name: Glimmering Blade
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Aegis
skills.description: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Salvation
skills.description: Places a [Revive On Death] buff on a single ally for 3 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is highly recommended to reduce their cooldowns, which is crucial for maintaining buffs and having his Revive on Death available more often. A 6-star rank is essential for him to have the defense and HP needed to be effective in end-game content.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A fantastic support champion who can significantly boost the survivability of any team.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier Epic for Clan Boss and a key champion for progressing in dungeons and Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a very strong and viable support champion for a variety of content, especially for players who lack Legendary-tier defensive supports.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Lordly Legionary
properties.summary: Lordly Legionary is an Epic Attack champion from the Banner Lords faction. He is a single-target damage dealer whose damage scales with the number of buffs he has. He also has a unique passive that grants him an extra turn when his HP drops below a certain threshold, giving him a chance to retaliate.

skills.name: Decapitate
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases by 5% for each buff on this Champion.

skills.name: Overpower
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Last Stand (Passive)
skills.description: When this Champion's HP drops below 20%, instantly grants an Extra Turn and places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.

investment_analysis.notes: Lordly Legionary is a niche champion who requires a specific team composition (heavy on buffs) to be effective. His low base stats and single-target focus make him a poor investment for most accounts.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Can be a decent single-target damage dealer if you lack other options.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: His effectiveness is very limited, and he is generally not used in mid-game content.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Primarily used to fill a spot in the Banner Lords Faction Wars team.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Morag Bronzelock
properties.summary: Morag Bronzelock is an Epic Support champion from the Dwarves faction. She is a powerful buffer who provides Strengthen and Increase Attack buffs, and she can also call an ally to attack with her. This combination makes her a great enabler for damage dealers, particularly in Arena and against bosses.

skills.name: Rune-Etched Axe
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Shield of the Forge
skills.description: Places a 25% [Strengthen] buff and a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Forge-Fire Rite
skills.description: Teams up with a target ally to attack an enemy. Morag Bronzelock and the target ally both use their default skills in the attack.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is mandatory to reduce their cooldowns to 3 turns, which is crucial for her effectiveness as a buffer and for her ally attack skill. A 6-star rank is highly recommended to improve her survivability and stats.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A very strong support champion for any new account.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier Epic buffer and a key champion for the Dwarves Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a valuable and versatile support champion, often used in specific Clan Boss, Hydra, and Arena teams to enable powerful damage dealers.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Nazana
properties.summary: Nazana is an Epic HP champion from the Demonspawn faction. She is a durable support champion whose main strength is her area-of-effect attack that places a Decrease Attack debuff. She also provides a shield for her team, making her a solid choice for improving survivability in dungeons and Faction Wars.

skills.name: Demonic Blade
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Sanguine Steel
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her skills is important to reduce their cooldowns, allowing for better uptime on her Decrease Attack debuff and Shield. A 6-star rank is recommended to maximize her HP, which increases the strength of her shield.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A very durable champion who can help new players survive early dungeons.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A solid choice for wave control in dungeons and a key champion for the Demonspawn Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: While often replaced by champions with more utility, she remains a reliable option for her role, especially in Faction Wars and for controlling waves in Doom Tower.

properties.name: Old Hermit Jorrg
properties.summary: Old Hermit Jorrg is an Epic Support champion from the Orcs faction. He is a powerful reviver and buffer, capable of bringing back dead allies and boosting their turn meter. He also provides Increase Attack and Revive on Death buffs, making him a versatile and valuable support for many areas of the game.

skills.name: Staff of Ages
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.description: Revives all dead allies with 35% HP, then fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 20%.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is important to reduce the cooldowns on his revive and buffs. A 6-star rank is highly recommended to ensure he is fast and tanky enough to survive and perform his role.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A fantastic reviver for new accounts, helping with progression through difficult content.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier Epic reviver and a key champion for the Orcs Faction Wars.

properties.name: Relickeeper
properties.summary: Relickeeper is an Epic Attack champion from the Sacred Order faction. He is a fusable champion who excels at single-target damage and can gain an extra turn upon killing an enemy. This makes him a potent, self-sufficient damage dealer for early game campaign farming and Arena, though his effectiveness wanes in later stages of the game.

skills.name: Blade of Justice
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Damage is based on ATK and DEF.

skills.name: Ageless Arts
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if this attack is critical.

skills.name: Surging Strength (Passive)
skills.description: Grants an Extra Turn if this Champion kills an enemy.

investment_analysis.notes: Relickeeper does not require books to perform his primary function. A 6-star rank is necessary for him to have enough damage to one-shot enemies and trigger his extra turn passive, but this investment should only be made if you lack a better campaign farmer.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A very strong campaign farmer and Arena nuker for new players, capable of carrying teams through early content.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: His single-target focus and lack of utility cause him to fall off in effectiveness as AoE damage becomes more important.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: His use is generally limited to the Sacred Order Faction Wars, where his single-target damage can be useful against the boss.

properties.name: Royal Guard
properties.summary: Royal Guard is an Epic Attack champion from the High Elves faction. He is one of the most renowned damage dealers in the game, famous for his 'Takedown' skill which deals damage based on enemy MAX HP. This makes him an S-tier champion for nearly all dungeon bosses and a staple in speed-running teams.

skills.name: Swift Parry
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of granting an Extra Turn.

skills.name: Takedown
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases according to enemy MAX HP.

skills.name: Hamstring
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his 'Takedown' skill is mandatory to reduce its cooldown, which is the source of his incredible boss-killing power. A 6-star rank is essential to maximize his critical damage and overall damage output.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A game-changing pull that will dramatically accelerate dungeon progression.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: The core damage dealer for almost all dungeon speed teams.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains one of the best Epic damage dealers in the game and is a staple in end-game speed farming for dungeons and Doom Tower bosses.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Sandlashed Survivor
properties.summary: Sandlashed Survivor is an Epic Defense champion from the Orcs faction. She is a premier support champion, specializing in extending the duration of buffs and mitigating damage with her passive. Her ability to extend buffs makes her a cornerstone of many unkillable and high-damage Clan Boss teams.

skills.name: Sandstorm Axe
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Survivor's Stand
skills.description: Extends the duration of all ally buffs by 1 turn, then places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Grit (Passive)
skills.description: When an ally is attacked, has a 25% chance to place a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on that ally for 1 turn. Also decreases the damage all allies receive by 5%.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking her 'Survivor's Stand' skill is mandatory to reduce its cooldown to 3 turns, which is the foundation of her role in Clan Boss teams. A 6-star rank is essential for her to have the survivability needed for end-game content.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A fantastic support champion who can greatly increase the survivability of any team.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A game-changing champion for Clan Boss, enabling many different unkillable and high-damage compositions.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains one of the best Epic supports in the game, a staple in end-game Clan Boss and Hydra teams, and a key champion for Orcs Faction Wars.

progression_timeline.mid_game_value: His value drops off significantly as better control and damage champions become available.

properties.name: Shaman

While her revive is valuable for new players, she is very slow and has a long cooldown on her revive, making her one of the weaker Epic champions.

properties.name: Spider

progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A solid champion for Dragon's Lair and a useful member of the Dark Elves Faction Wars team.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Often replaced by top-tier poisoners, but his durability and AoE poison application can still be valuable in specific situations.

properties.name: Stag Knight
properties.summary: Stag Knight is an Epic Support champion from the Banner Lords faction. He is widely considered one of the best Epic champions in the game due to his ability to place both Decrease Attack and Decrease Defense on all enemies in a single skill. This, combined with his Decrease Speed debuff, makes him an S-tier champion for nearly every area of the game.

skills.name: Huntmaster
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Bird of Prey
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has an 85% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff and a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Keen Eye (Passive)
skills.description: Increases this Champion's ACC by 10 for each enemy alive.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his 'Bird of Prey' skill is mandatory to reduce its cooldown to 3 turns, making him one of the most consistent debuffers in the game. A 6-star rank is essential to give him the accuracy and survivability needed to perform his role everywhere.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A game-changing pull that will be the best debuffer on any new account.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: The core debuffer for nearly all content, from dungeons and Clan Boss to Arena.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains one of the best Epic champions in the game. Even with access to Legendary debuffers, Stag Knight's reliability and compact kit keep him relevant in end-game content.

progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A solid Arena nuker and wave clearer for dungeons. She is a key damage dealer for the Sacred Order Faction Wars.

properties.name: Toragi the Frog
properties.summary: Toragi the Frog is an Epic HP champion from the Shadowkin faction. He is an S-tier support champion, particularly for Clan Boss and Hydra, due to his combination of Ally Protection, Poison, Decrease Attack, and a passive that reflects damage and places poisons. His entire kit is designed for team survivability and sustained damage.

skills.name: Corrosive Venom
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Bog Blessing
skills.description: Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, equal to 20% of their MAX HP.

skills.description: When an ally under an [Ally Protection] buff is attacked, has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff on the attacker for 2 turns. Also places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on the attacker for 2 turns when this Champion is attacked.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his 'Bog Blessing' skill is mandatory to reduce its cooldown to 3 turns, allowing for 100% uptime on Ally Protection with a buff extender. A 6-star rank is essential for him to have the HP and defense needed to survive and protect his team.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A game-changing support champion for any account, providing top-tier survivability and damage.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A core member of most mid-game Clan Boss teams and a key to progressing in dungeons and Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains one of the best Epic champions in the game. He is a staple in many end-game Clan Boss and Hydra teams.

skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Places a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns. This skill requires an ally to place an [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion to activate.

skills.name: Infernal Contract
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 3 turns, then attacks all enemies. Instantly activates any [HP Burn] debuffs on each enemy.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is important to reduce their cooldowns, allowing for a consistent HP burn strategy in Spider's Den. A 6-star rank is necessary for him to have the accuracy and survivability needed for high-level Spider.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A powerful champion for progressing through the Spider's Den dungeon.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier specialist for Spider 20, enabling many players to farm this crucial dungeon.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a premier choice for Spider farming and is a valuable asset for the Orcs Faction Wars.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Vildrax
properties.summary: Vildrax is an Epic Attack champion from the Demonspawn faction. He is a specialist in placing and utilizing HP Burn debuffs, with a unique ability to spread them from one target to all others. This makes him a powerful, though somewhat situational, champion for wave-based content and certain bosses.

skills.name: Fiery Fists
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Conflagration
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. If the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff, spreads the debuff to all other enemies.

skills.name: Combustion
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Instantly activates any [HP Burn] debuffs on each enemy.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is important to reduce their cooldowns, which is key to his HP burn spreading and activation combo. A 6-star rank is recommended if you plan to use him in high-level content to ensure he has enough accuracy and survivability.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A decent damage dealer, but his mechanics can be tricky for new players to utilize.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A strong specialist for Spider's Den and Hydra, and a valuable member of the Demonspawn Faction Wars team.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: His niche role as an HP burn spreader and activator keeps him relevant for specific strategies in Hydra and Doom Tower.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
description: A comprehensive, revised template for storing Raid Shadow Legends champion data. This version introduces a categorized rating system and provides complete, step-by-step mastery paths.

properties.name: Visionary
properties.summary: Visionary is an Epic Support champion from the Dark Elves faction. He is a powerful cleanser and buffer, capable of removing all debuffs from his team and placing Block Debuffs and Revive on Death. This makes him an excellent counter to debuff-heavy teams in the Arena and a great survivability-booster for dungeons.

skills.name: Guiding Light
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Clarity
skills.description: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then places a [Block Debuffs] buff on them for 2 turns.

skills.name: Foresight
skills.description: Places a [Revive On Death] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his skills is mandatory to reduce their cooldowns, which is crucial for his role as a cleanser and buffer. A 6-star rank is highly recommended to ensure he is fast and tanky enough to perform his role effectively.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A fantastic support champion who can carry a new account through difficult debuff-heavy content.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier cleanser for Arena and dungeons, and a key champion for the Dark Elves Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains one of the best Epic cleansers in the game, frequently used in go-second Arena teams and for specific Doom Tower floors.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Vogoth
properties.summary: Vogoth is an Epic HP champion from the Undead Hordes faction. He is a unique and powerful support champion who provides massive team-wide healing through his passive. He also brings Leech and Provoke debuffs, making him an S-tier champion for survivability in almost all content, especially against bosses that hit multiple targets.

skills.name: Whip of Torment
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Mass Torture
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Also places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

skills.name: Bloodshield (Passive)
skills.description: Whenever this Champion is attacked, heals all allies by 20% of the damage received. Whenever an ally is attacked, heals that ally by 10% of the damage received.

investment_analysis.notes: Booking his AoE provoke is important to reduce its cooldown. A 6-star rank is essential to maximize his HP, which directly scales his healing and survivability, making him one of the best healers in the game.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A game-changing champion who provides unparalleled healing and survivability for new accounts.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A core member of almost any team, excelling in Clan Boss, dungeons, and Arena.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains one of the best Epic champions in the game. His unique passive healing makes him a staple in end-game Hydra, Doom Tower, and go-second Arena teams.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Vrask
properties.summary: Vrask is an Epic HP champion from the Orcs faction. He is a unique healer whose healing is triggered by his critical hits. This makes him a potent and consistent source of team-wide healing, especially in content where he can attack frequently, such as against the Fire Knight or in dungeons with multiple waves.

skills.name: Mace Slam
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals all allies by 10% of this Champion's MAX HP if this attack is critical.

skills.name: Torture
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.

skills.name: Unbreakable (Passive)
skills.description: Increases this Champion's Turn Meter by 15% each time they lose 15% of their MAX HP from a single hit.

investment_analysis.notes: Vrask does not require books to perform his primary healing role, which is tied to his default skill. A 6-star rank is highly recommended to maximize his HP (which his heals scale from) and to equip a banner for more stats.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: A fantastic healer for new accounts, providing consistent team-wide healing.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: A top-tier healer for dungeons, especially Fire Knight, and a key champion for the Orcs Faction Wars.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Remains a very strong and reliable healer, particularly in content where consistent, passive healing is valuable, such as Doom Tower and certain Hydra rotations.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3

properties.name: Yaga the Insatiable
properties.summary: Yaga the Insatiable is an Epic Attack champion from the Skinwalkers faction, obtained as a login reward. He is a poisoner whose kit is designed for Clan Boss and Dragon. However, he is widely considered one of the weakest login reward champions and is outclassed by many other poisoners, including some Rares.

skills.name: Grave Chill
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Venomblast
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places three 5% [Poison] debuffs on the target for 2 turns.

skills.name: Insatiable (Passive)
skills.description: Increases this Champion's Turn Meter by 10% for each enemy killed by a [Poison] debuff placed by this Champion.

investment_analysis.notes: Yaga is a poor investment. His poison application is inconsistent and on a long cooldown. Champions like Frozen Banshee (a Rare) are significantly better poisoners. It is not recommended to invest books or rank him to 6-star.

progression_timeline.early_game_value: Can serve as a temporary poisoner for Clan Boss and Dragon for new players.
progression_timeline.mid_game_value: He is quickly replaced by better poisoners and has very little use in mid-game content.
progression_timeline.late_game_value: Only used for Faction Wars if no other options are available.

title: Raid Shadow Legends Champion v2.3
